#!/usr/bin/env ruby
require "#{ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH']}/lib/textmate" require "erb" include ERB::Util
$todo = [] $fixme = [] $changed = []
TextMate.each_text_file do |filepath|
File.open(filepath) do |f| filename = File.basename(filepath) f.each_line do |line| if(m = line.match(/(TODO)([\s,:])+(\w.*)$/i)) $todo.push({ :filepath => filepath, :filename => html_escape(filename), :item => html_escape(m[3]), :line_contents => html_escape(line), :lineno => f.lineno }) elsif(m = line.match(/(FIXME|FIX ME)([\s,:])+(\w.*)$/i)) $fixme.push({ :filepath => filepath, :filename => html_escape(filename), :item => html_escape(m[3]), :line_contents => html_escape(line), :lineno => f.lineno}) elsif(m = line.match(/(CHANGED)([\s,:])+(\w.*)$/)) $changed.push({ :filepath => filepath, :filename => html_escape(filename), :item => html_escape(m[3]), :line_contents => html_escape(line), :lineno => f.lineno}) end end end
end
puts ERB.new(File.open("#{ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT']}/template.rhtml"), 0, '<>').result
